Review.Summary: Giovanni’s Italia Fine Dinning is a completely restored Victorian stone house and offers a warm and elegant atmosphere and gracious service.

Appetizer.Name: Sweet and Sour Fried Wonton Skin

Entree.Name: Sweet and Sour Fish Cantonese Style

Review.Summary: The food is always consistent. A good variety of dim sum, sushi, Chinese andeven Vietnamese dishes. The service is quick and the food is plentiful. We satdown last night and within seconds of turning in our first order, the plates were onthe table! The teriyaki dishes had the right type of sauce and weren'tsickeningly sweet. The chicken, fish, and beef were perfectly cooked. The maki rolls were neatly rolled, cut properly and seasoned well. Loved the General Tao chicken,the steamed BBQ pork buns, the eel sushi and the lovely eggplant. Wewill be going back again! I would highly recommend it.

Entree.Name: Enchiladas de Mole (3 pcs)
Entree.Description: Lightly sauteed corn tortillas, choice of filling, covered in mole sauce, topped with onions, sour cream, and crumbled cheese.

Review.Summary: My favorite Restaurant in Ottawa. The family who owns it are very warm and lovely people. They are incredible at recognizing you when you come back. The burritos are super good. You can customize however you want (guac is included!). I especially love that there is cactus in the veggie mix; it is a small, special thing that sets this place apart from other Mexican spots downtown.
Lorem ipsum the way of life built in the hands of many, anticipate the life taken far from the minds of the few
